title: God Mode
description:
Year: 2013 
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 3rd Person 
Developer: Saber Interactive and Old School Games 
Publishing House: Atlus 
Language: English/Multi

Publication Type: Licence 
Platform: PC 
Description: Like it quickly run and shoot straight? Use an arsenal of different kinds of skills? Play with friends (up to 4 players on one card)? And dozens of enemies, where you can unleash your firepower, and obtained for the destruction of opponents gold and experience points to spend on a new, even more deadly equipment ... If everything described pleases your ears - so you just like God Mode.
This new third-person shooter combines the best elements of retro shooters and role-playing games. God Mode combines non-linear gameplay, a hurricane fire, hordes of enemies, a full-fledged co-op mode for four players and excellent graphics and music surrounding. You will not be bored - there are dozens of in-game modifiers allow you to change the gameplay literally "on the fly." It offers - characters, appearance and equipment are modified according to your wishes. And earned in battles experience points and gold will help open new deadly weapons and unique abilities - and improve them!

Features Repack:
* Co-op game mode up to 4 people (with special PvP-Zones) 
* New, improve weapons and abilities, that can be opened for gold and experience points 
* Highly customizable characters appearance 
* Dozens of test of faith (in-game modifiers) and dynamically changing gameplay

** Language of the game depends on the language of the installer (do not forget to turn the subtitles on the game settings)**
